data.actual_result: The menu is closed and you returned to the previous screen, exactly like if you pressed the Back button.
data.expected_result: The Settings menu you opened at step 1 should still be opened
data.short_description: Pressing Home button after opening any settings page will close it
data.steps_to_repro: - 1) Open the settings page of anything in Discord: it could be server settings, channel settings, category settings, my account settings, or even the create invite menu or any user profile - 2) Just press the Home button (do **not** close the app) - 3) Go back to Discord
